messages: 3504cc0546049ecb7fe1af2d192a4a03 (15:51): I'm getting "final link failed: Memory exhausted" when building libxul.so. I have 3.3GB RAM and 2GB Swap but it does not seem to be touching swap when trying to build libxul :(
3504cc0546049ecb7fe1af2d192a4a03 (15:56): my stack size is set to 10240 kbytes, could that be causing the problem or does get that overridden somewhere in the config
3504cc0546049ecb7fe1af2d192a4a03 (16:03): i'll try without |enable-debugger-info-modules="yes"| and see if it builds ok like that
2a753bdf022916325fe8de843e0abf48 (16:16): 3504cc0546049ecb7fe1af2d192a4a03: using gold or bfd version of the linker?

5d907853a9617cfd55fb62eae803595b (16:34): 3504cc0546049ecb7fe1af2d192a4a03, I too have had a couple of "Memory exhausted" failures when building Firefox lately. I was building on a partition with about 3 GB free disk. Freeing a couple of GB extra solved the issue. (32-bits Ubuntu 10.04)
2a753bdf022916325fe8de843e0abf48 (16:35): even though it's not using it
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (16:43): the red on b-s looks, well, bs
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (16:43): the log says everything through make check finished
050421e96671fe1a3d8cf2b5dbe99cb7 (16:43): what does a search for "failed (" say?

050421e96671fe1a3d8cf2b5dbe99cb7 (16:45): well, I didn't mean *exactly* that line, but I presume that block is downloading either codesighs if you're in an opt build or leak if you're in a debug build
050421e96671fe1a3d8cf2b5dbe99cb7 (16:46): and although aki meant to have created them everywhere on the new ftp.m.o, he might have somehow missed b-s (and try, the way it looked last night)
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (16:46): looks like it's the leak log
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (16:47): HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 404 Not Found

050421e96671fe1a3d8cf2b5dbe99cb7 (16:47): it's just that silly start of a new tree thing, where it takes whatever it is, two opt and three debug runs per OS to get to green, unless its a time of day and day of the week where you can get a relenger to touch your files
050421e96671fe1a3d8cf2b5dbe99cb7 (16:48): which still burns a debug build, I think, since "" isn't a valid leak log
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (16:49): proceeds to not worry about it
273b79ac2d0d1e9dd5857cbc7fb8b28a (16:49): What's the best way to drop all changes since the last hg qrefresh?
273b79ac2d0d1e9dd5857cbc7fb8b28a (16:52): Phew. I didn't completely screw up then :)
3504cc0546049ecb7fe1af2d192a4a03 (17:00): 2a753bdf022916325fe8de843e0abf48: I don't think ld.gold appeared until fedora 13 :(
